content: Seriously is Not the Next-Gen Movie Studio  Rovio produced a licensing and merchandising juggernaut, but so did Sanrio with Hello Kitty. Will anyone care about Angry Birds in forty years? Snow White is pushing eighty. Free-to-play mobile gaming companies like King, Supercell, and Machine Zone are not the next movie studios — they are the next casinos. So the real question is whether this industry will face similar regulation. 🎰
